description: A Flaming Dr. Pepper cocktail is a delicious drink that is perfect for the warmer months of the year. It's hard to resist this flaming concoction with its sweet, spicy flavor and beautiful red color! Making your own flaming Dr. Pepper cocktail may seem daunting at first glance - but don't worry, this recipe will help you!
name: Flaming Dr. Pepper

recipeInstructions.name: Pour the beer into a pint glass and fill with ice cubes, leaving just enough room for the other ingredients.
